About: The 2022 World Cup is set to be the second edition of the FIFA World Cup, the quadrennial international men's football tournament contested by the national teams of FIFA. It will be hosted by Qatar from November 21 to December 18, 2022.

The European League, the European League, or as it was previously known, the European Cup is a football competition for European clubs established in 1971 by the European Football Association. It is the second most important European club football tournament after the UEFA Champions League.
The UEFA Champions League, usually referred to only as the Champions League, is an annual European football tournament organized by UEFA since 1955 for the best football clubs in Europe.

The English Premier League is the first division football league in England and the name Premier League was used in 1992. The league consists of 20 teams, sponsored by Barclays Bank, and is therefore called the Barclays Premier League

The Italian League, the first division, known as Syria A for short, and the League of the First Division for reasons of sponsorship, is the highest-level competition of the professional football league in Italy, and it is one of the elite leagues in the world, known for its first launch in 1898.

A strange incident witnessed in the friendly match between South Korea and Egypt, reinforced the "retreat" of the Egyptian team recently in one take.
